title: Weeding wars in peaceful places
creator_credit: Llywellyn Staiff, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Flora, fauna and bushland is what makes Maroondah and Australia different to anywhere else in the world. The agenda of Llywellyn and her colleagues is to protect what’s left.
